character.name: Hog Rider
character.description: Fast Melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of 'HOG RIDERRRRR' all the way throguh the arena doors.

details.description: Fast Melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of 'HOG RIDERRRRR' all the way throguh the arena doors.
Tough Melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.
Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair, the Musketeer is a mean shot with her trusty boomstick.
Three fast, unarmored melee attackers. Small, fast, green and mean!
Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling Tornado-y magnet. Doesn't effect buildings.
A horde of melee attackers with mean mustaches and even meaner tempers.
It's HUGE! Once it began rolling down Frozen Peak, There was no stopping it. Enemies hit are knocked back and slowed down.
